EmailTemplate.description: To be used when product team does not have a Salesforce queue for the case to be assigned
EmailTemplate.name: Forwarded cases
EmailTemplate.subject: Forwarded case
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
We have triaged your inquiry to the relevant team for further assistance where a member of that team will reach out to you shortly.
If you do not hear from them, please reply to this email or contact us and we will be more than happy to assist you further.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care Support Portal
